content.p: Interested in a degree in education? Hear first-hand from our students about their studies and life at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. You can also read more on what our students say... Hasan testifies on the strengths and experience studying a degree in the School of Education. Joy shares her experience working towards a degree in BEd Education with TESOL. Shafiqah expresses what she loves about the School of Education. A group of ten students visited two schools in Thailand. This Overseas Educational Programme is an extension of the Schoolâ€™s Professional Development Programme Series which aims to provide hands-on and real life experiences... Video credit: Son Cin Ee, Bachelor of Education with Honours (TESOL), student. In 2016, School of Education students visited several educational institutions in Sri Lanka. Some of their unforgettable wonderful memories and valuable experiences are captured in this video. telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
